document_data.name: Drauz
document_data.mainbody:
'''Drauz the Dreg''' was an [[Elf|elven]] ship captain who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite document/Before the Storm}}
{{Quote|I remember you, krill eater. Now you remember this, you ain't getting on this boat. Not now, not ever.|Drauz the Dreg.}}
document_data.Possessions: Drauz had a ship that could be described as having a worn appearance.
document_data.History:
According to dockworkers, Captain Drauz the Dreg used deceit and managed to assume the role of [[harbormaster]] of the [[Neverwinter/Blacklake District|Blacklake district]]'s docks in Neverwinter. He was spotted flogging the dockworkers on multiple occasions, and there was a troubling incident where he took candy from a small child.

Circa {{YearlinkName|1480}}, Drauz was "put in his place" by a [[Fighter (Before the Storm)|carpenter]] who was since called a "hero" among local dockworkers. Drauz then left the town.

Nevertheless, in {{YearlinkName|1481}},{{Stormwreck-time}} his ship was docked at Pier 9 of the docks of the Blacklake district. By chance, he unexpectedly received several pleas from adventurers, among whom was the carpenter who had thrown a wrench in the captain's lfve, to be ferried to [[Stormwreck Isle]] aboard his ship on the same day. It's unknown how exactly the carpenter ultimately got to the isle; he may have saved Drauz's ship from a pirate, or he had simply stowed aboard the ship.
